授業方法:
Various methods including, pair and group work, listening exercises, dialog construction and presentation.
Each class will consist of various speaking and listening skills, pair work and group activities. Creating and writing theme-based dialogs and presenting them will also be included.  Online students due to illness will be expected to do On Demand assignments.

第1回: Introduction:  class format, rules and advice, classroom interview chart, self-introductions
Review of introduction, goals and aspirations.  45 minutes of out of class study.
第2回: Text "Lifestyle"  pair work gap exercise, listening and reading comprehension
Extending the dialogs of the in-class exercise.  One hour of out of class study.
第3回: Text "Lifestyle" continued, prepositions, pair dialog about your lifestyle now
Essay writing:  How to improve your lifestyle.  One hour or more of study.
第4回: Text "Food"   chemistry, nutrition, shortages, vocabulary matching drills
Grammar perspective worksheet assignment.  One hour of study.
第5回: Text "Food" continued, comparing diets, listening comprehension drills
Introducing strange food items from around the world.  One hour of research study.
第6回: Text  "Sports"   present tense, common "wh" questions, pair work gap exercise
Presentation first draft.  90 minutes of out of class study.
第7回: pair work vocabulary memory activity, individual presentation instruction, first draft
Revision of presentation.  One hour of study.
第8回: Individual presentations and feedback, Text "Marriage"  reading comprehension, describing people
Essay writing of critique of presentation.  One hour of study.
第9回: Text "Marriage" continued, listening comprehension, newlywed pair work dialog construction and presentation
Review of in-class study and research of marriage customs from around the world.  One hour or more of study.
第10回: Text "Environment"   pair work gap exercise, group activity interview chart
Note taking to bring to the next class about environmental issues concerning us all.  One hour or more of study.
第11回: Text "Environment" continued, addressing problems, offering solutions, vocabulary and usage
Environmental vocabulary worksheet assignment.  One hour of out of class study.
第12回: Text "Okinawa"   cultural historical perspective, questions for consideration, making hotel reservations
Final class questions for the teacher or classmates.  One hour of preparation.
第13回: Course review, test explanation, question and answer period
Short essay on the semester ahead.  One hour or more of study.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.
